name: purchase_insurance
attributes: # [doc = " NFT 保険を購入し、保険料を支払うが、"]
# [doc = " insurance_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let ins = & mut ctx . accounts . insurance_account ;
ins . collected_premiums = ins . collected_premiums . checked_add (premium) . unwrap () ;
let extra = ctx . accounts . config . coverage_duration ;
ins . coverage_ends = ins . coverage_ends . checked_add (extra) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= premium ;
* * ctx . accounts . pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += premium ;

fields.name: insurance_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] で照合チェックを行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保険を購入するユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保険料プール格納先アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保険設定（補償期間など）を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この保険契約を所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: coverage_ends
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 補償終了時刻（UNIX タイムスタンプ）"]

fields.name: coverage_duration
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 購入ごとに延長される補償期間（秒）"]
